fix: move map layers config from preferences to dedicated config

Problem:
Currently map layer visibility settings are stored in user preferences, making
it impossible for new layers to be visible to existing users, as the app copies
the defaults into user preferences which are then never updated.

Solution:
- Move layer visibility configurations from defaultPreferences.config.ts to
  a dedicated sectionLayers export in layers.config.ts
- Update TransitionMainMap to use this configuration first, with fallback to
  user preferences for backward compatibility
- Remove layer configuration from default preferences
- Add unit tests to validate the changes

This change ensures new layers will be visible to all users while maintaining
backward compatibility.

closes #1265
